section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This chapter may be cited as the “Department of Mental Health Establishment Amendment Act of 2001”.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 101 of Mental Health Service Delivery Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-144, October 23, 2001, 48 DCR 9947).
